title: Operations & Maintenance Manager
summary: In RE&D, we don't sit back and let things happen, we make things happen, and we do this in service to all Apple employees and customers. Our team is a diverse and nimble group that manages Appleʼs workplaces and workplace services.
description: Working with and through immediate staff - the ideal candidate will lead the maintenance and operational integrity of mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and other infrastructure systems, develop and implements standards and practices to improve operational efficiency. The successful candidate will collaborate with the Facilities team to ensure successful delivery of contracted maintenance services to meet site needs, will lead facilities support employees and contractors to deliver operations services in a timely and cost-effective manner and will coordinate response to emergency situations that may impact operations...
key_qualifications: 5+ years of hands-on experience working in a fast-paced multi-facility environment, with a focus on providing the best possible service...
education_experience: Bachelors degree in Engineering or related field
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $146,800 and $220,900, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
